From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2021 film by Ssaurabh Tyagi


Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai?Promotional posterDirected bySsaurabh TyagiWritten bySsaurabh TyagiProduced byDhaval Jayantilal GadaAksshay Jayantilal GadaStarringJassie GillSurbhi JyotiCinematographyR M SswamyEdited bySailessh DubeyMusic byScore:Amar MohileSongs:Rahul MishraRochak KohliPayal DevAvvy SraProductioncompanyPen India LimitedDistributed byZEE5Release date
10 September 2021 (2021-09-10)[1]
Running time136 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai? (lit. Is my Sonam Gupta unfaithful?) is a 2021 Indian Hindi-language comedy film written and directed by Ssaurabh Tyagi and produced by Dhaval Jayantilal Gada and Aksshay Jayantilal Gada under the banner Pen India Limited.[2][3] It features Jassie Gill and Surbhi Jyoti in lead roles.[4] Alongside late Surekha Sikri, Vijay Raaz, Kaviraj Laique, Brijendra Kala and Atul Shrivastava.[5][6] The film premiered on 10 September 2021 on ZEE5.[1]


Cast[edit]
Jassie Gill as Sintu
Surbhi Jyoti as Sonam Gupta
Surekha Sikri as Dadi
Vijay Raaz as Sanjeev Nagraj
Kaviraj Laique as Kundan
Brijendra Kala as Sonam's father
Atul Shrivastava as Sintu's father
Rajesh Sharma as Travel Agent
Saaki as Sintu's friend
Manjeet Singh Rathore as Sintu's friend
Soundtrack[edit]
Kya Meri Sonam Gupta Bewafa Hai?Soundtrack album by Rahul Mishra, Rochak Kohli, Payal Dev and Avvy SraReleased7 September 2021[7]Recorded2020GenreFeature film soundtrackLength21:09LanguageHindiLabelSaregama Music
The songs featured in the film are composed by Rahul Mishra, Rochak Kohli, Payal Dev and Avvy Sra while lyrics are written by Happy Raikoti, Manoj Muntashir and Rahul Mishra.
